feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2/SBG1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment update
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 12, 09:30 - 13:30 UTC

Aug 8, 20:07 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 12/09/2024 09:30 UTC
End time : 12/09/2024 13:30 UTC
Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for some servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade (push binaries only)
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 26, 07:00 UTC  -  Aug 30, 15:00 UTC

Aug 22, 09:01 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 26/08/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 30/08/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h (VCSA) . Customer responsibility , Put in maintenance mode each host one by one and then restart it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.
